name: Poly Path
body:
### Poly Path
An application that finds the shortest path to your classes using an A* Search algorithm.  

![Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AlexanderRayMartin/master/src/ApplicationScreenshot.PNG)

### System Architecture 
3-tier architecture: **User Interface --> Business Logic / A* Search --> Save Functionality**

### Design Patterns
Singleton Pattern  
* Save Functionality  
* User Schedule  

Observer Pattern
* Button Listener
* Mouse Listener

### UML Class Diagram
![Class diagram overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AlexanderRayMartin/master/src/ClassDiagramOverview.png)

![Class diagram detailed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AlexanderRayMartin/master/src/ClassDiagram.png)

### Key Learning from Project Creation
* Importance of documentation
* Version control
* Refactoring often makes code much easier to maintain and to add new features

### Authors and Contributors
@AlexanderRayMartin

### Support or Contact
alexanderraymartin@gmail.com
